items.sentence: Perhaps it would be better if I went by myself.
Tom was painting the fence yesterday afternoon.
I\'ll never tell anybody what you just told me.
I\'ll sing a couple of songs if you want me to.
I\'ll take care of all the travel arrangements.
I wish there were something I could do to help.
I wish you both all the happiness in the world.
We have three hours to prepare for the meeting.
We have to leave at the crack of dawn tomorrow.
We have to make sure that we get there on time.
Tell me where you think you left your umbrella.
I suspect Tom won\'t help Mary do that anymore.
I suspect Tom won\'t tell Mary why he did that.
I wonder why Tom won\'t sit next to me anymore.
I can\'t believe you\'re going to Tom\'s party.
I wonder whether or not Tom likes Chinese food.
Tom always seems uncomfortable around children.
Tom and Mary barricaded themselves in the room.
This product was discontinued due to low sales.
This would be such a great place to raise kids.
